CIBEY.summary: Commercial International Bank -Egypt S.A.E provides retail, corporate, and investment banking services in Egypt. The company operates through four segments: Corporate Banking, Investment Banking, Retail Banking, and Others. It offers current and saving accounts, save and safe accounts, time deposits, certificates of deposit, and business accounts; and revolving and unsecured overdrafts, as well as mortgage, personal, educational, solar, and travel loans. The company also offers credit, debit, prepaid, and business cards; roadside assistance services; mobile, Internet, and phone banking services; and ATM and e-payment services. In addition, it provides investment products and services; self-employed programs; e-banking solutions and services, including business banking access cards and global transaction services advanced solutions; and cash management services, as well as corporate banking services. Further, the company offers other credit facilities; derivative products; financial instruments trading, structured financing, Corporate leasing, and merger and acquisitions advisory; and foreign currency services, as well as assets management services. It operates through approximately 196 branches. The company was formerly known as Chase National Bank of Egypt and changed its name to Commercial International Bank -Egypt S.A.E in January 1987. Commercial International Bank -Egypt S.A.E was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Giza, Egypt.
